title: Zimbabwe: Youths Umbrella Body Says Zanu-PF Tag a Hindrance, Pleads for Rebranding
text:
Africa: Life After HIV Status Disclosure - Good or Bad? 
THE Zimbabwe Youth Council (ZYC) says negative perceptions the public has of the outfit is hindering their progress and as such wants government to help in the rebranding of the organisation. 
Leaders of the organisation feel that government must help them rebrand and change the perception of the organisation so that it appeals and reaches to all youths in the country. 
This comes amid allegations that the ZYC, which should represent all the youths regardless of their political affiliation, was essentially a Zanu PF project. 
Also, within the ruling party, concerns have been raised that only youths related or linked to senior officials were benefiting from the organisation's projects. 
"We want to rebrand in order to change the perception of the organisation because even though we are found at national level and in the provinces we still fail to reach out to all the youths," said the organisation's acting director Sungano Chisina. 
He was addressing the new youth and indigenisation minister Patrick Zhuwawo in Harare this week. 
Zhuwayo, however, said he was not comfortable with the term "rebranding", adding government had no resources for the "rebranding" Chisina was requesting. 
Instead, the minister advised Chisina to approach and work with youth officers who are found in the government departments throughout the country. 
He said there were youth officers in the provinces and wards working with agricultural extension officers throughout the country, which the ZYC could collaborate with and reach out to all the youths in the country. 
Zhuwao's advice to the youths outfit comes at a time when the opposition is complaining about the presence of Zanu PF youth officers who are on government pay roll. 
Found in virtually all government departments, these youths brag about their connection with the ruling party and reportedly serve as informers while receiving civil servants wages and benefits. 
ZYC falls under Zhuwao's ministry and they oversee all youths' activities in the country Zimbabwe
